title: Well, what are you doing now?
brief_description: This is a unique video made by a group of older Australians which promotes positive images of older adults in a range of community recreation activities. The group have demonstrated their capacity to master technical audio visual equipment and produce a challenging VHS video.
description: This is a unique video made by a group of older Australians which promotes positive images of older adults in a range of community recreation activities. The group have demonstrated their capacity to master technical audio visual equipment and produce a challenging VHS video.
